Eliya The Label is a leading force in Australia’s designer fashion scene, celebrated for our distinctive designs and meticulous attention to detail. As we continue to grow, we’re looking for passionate, driven individuals to become part of our dynamic team.

If you live and breathe luxury fashion, have a keen eye for styling, and bring experience in the fashion industry, we’d love to hear from you.

Our head office is located in Keilor Park, Melbourne, VIC.

Eliya The Label is an innovative and dynamic fashion brand, renowned for creating statement pieces that redefine eventwear and bridal style.

With continued growth and an expanding global presence, we are excited to offer a unique opportunity for a passionate and creative Social Media and Content Coordinator to join our team.

This role is responsible for managing and evolving Eliya The Label’s social media channels, including Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and Pinterest. The successful candidate will create high-quality content that aligns with our brand identity, drives audience engagement, and strengthens customer connection.

This full-time role is based at our Head Office in Melbourne. If you’re ready to make an impact with a forward-thinking fashion brand and bring fresh ideas to life, we want to hear from you!

What you’ll be doing:

  • Developing and executing a social media strategy to grow brand awareness, engagement, and audience loyalty.
  • Managing Eliya The Label’s social media platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and Pinterest.
  • Creating and curating content across photo, video, and copy formats, including filming, editing, and post-production.
  • Collaborating with the creative team to ensure all content aligns with our brand voice and vision.
  • Scheduling and publishing posts to maintain a consistent and on-brand message across all channels.
  • Monitoring and engaging with our social media community, responding to comments, messages, and mentions to build strong relationships.
  • Keeping up-to-date with social media trends, new features, and platforms to identify opportunities for growth and innovation.
  • Assisting with the planning and execution of seasonal campaigns, content shoots, and product launches.
  • Analysing social media performance metrics and providing insights to optimise future content and strategy.

What we’d love from you:

  • Proven experience in social media management and content creation, ideally in fashion, beauty, or a similar creative industry.
  • A strong understanding of Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, and Facebook platforms.
  • Proficiency in content creation tools (e.g. Canva, Adobe Suite, CapCut, or similar).
  • Excellent written communication skills with a creative flair for storytelling.
  • A keen eye for aesthetics and attention to detail.
  • A hands-on, can-do attitude with a proactive and solution-focused mindset.
  • Exceptional organisational and time management skills.
  • The ability to work independently while collaborating effectively with the wider team.
  • A passion for fashion, creativity, and driving meaningful audience connections.

What you’ll love from us:

  • A collaborative, supportive, and inspiring work environment where your ideas are valued.
  • Opportunities for growth and professional development within a fast-growing global brand.
  • The chance to work on high-impact projects and shape the direction of our social presence.
  • International and national travel opportunities for photoshoots and events
  • A stunning Head Office workspace in Melbourne.
  • Generous staff discounts to enjoy Eliya The Label’s collections.
  • A dynamic, fashion-focused culture with a passionate team that values creativity and innovation.

This is your chance to be part of a progressive and inspiring brand that is redefining the eventwear and bridal landscape.

To apply:

Click the link below and send your resume, examples of your work and a short video introducing yourself.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Eliya The Label is an innovative and dynamic fashion brand, renowned for creating statement pieces that redefine eventswear and bridal.

With continued growth and an expanding global presence, we are excited to offer a unique opportunity for a passionate and organised Marketing and Partnerships Coordinator to join our team.

This role is responsible for managing partnerships, coordinating marketing campaigns, and ensuring Eliya The Label’s message is communicated seamlessly across all channels. The successful candidate will play a key role in building brand awareness, driving collaborations, and strengthening relationships with key partners.

This full-time role is based at our Head Office in Melbourne. If you’re ready to help take a forward-thinking fashion brand to new heights, we want to hear from you!

What you’ll be doing:

  • Developing and executing marketing campaigns that align with Eliya The Label’s brand strategy.
  • Identifying, building, and managing partnerships with influencers, brands, and industry collaborators to drive awareness and growth.
  • Coordinating partnership campaigns, from concept through to delivery, ensuring they align with Eliya The Label’s creative vision and values.
  • Assisting with the planning, coordination, and execution of seasonal campaigns, product launches, and events.
  • Collaborating with the creative and social media teams to produce engaging content that supports marketing initiatives.
  • Managing communication and deliverables for key retail and wholesale partners.
  • Analysing the performance of partnerships and campaigns, providing insights and recommendations to optimise future strategies.
  • Staying ahead of industry trends to identify new opportunities for growth and collaboration.

What we’d love from you:

  • Proven experience in marketing, partnerships, or brand coordination, ideally within the fashion or beauty industry.
  • Strong project management and organisational skills with the ability to juggle multiple priorities.
  • A creative mindset with a passion for building relationships and driving brand growth.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Proficiency in marketing tools and platforms, such as Klaviyo, Photoshop, and Canva.
  • A proactive and results-driven attitude with strong problem-solving abilities.
  • The ability to work collaboratively while also taking initiative and working independently.
  • A deep understanding of Eliya The Label’s brand values, customer base, and industry landscape.

What you’ll love from us:

  • A collaborative, supportive, and inspiring work environment where your ideas are valued.
  • Opportunities for growth and professional development within a fast-growing global brand.
  • The chance to work on impactful campaigns and partnerships that shape Eliya The Label’s future.
  • A stunning Head Office workspace in Melbourne.
  • Generous staff discounts to enjoy Eliya The Label’s collections.
  • A dynamic, fashion-focused culture with a passionate team that values creativity and innovation.

This is your chance to play a key role in elevating a progressive and inspiring brand within the global fashion landscape.

To apply:

Click the link below and send your resume, examples of your work and a short video introducing yourself.
